description.value:
"You have long been careful to hide the worst of yourself and your family from outsiders. Their greatest atrocities are tales of horror, yet the truth of them is far worse."

Endless caution and boundless cunning define generations of your ancestors, and you have inherited these traits along with something far more sinister. Now you are the head of the family, and your power can be used to any end you wish...so long as nobody discovers it.

The taint runs deep in your bloodline, and while you have learned to conceal it perfectly, its corruption has already taken root in your soul.

system.benefit: You gain the Dark Soul talent and Deceive as a trained Skill. In addition, you receive a +5 bonus to either Intelligence or Willpower. However, the taint is so deeply rooted within your line that you gain 1d10+10 Corruption Points.
system.notes: Grants Dark Soul, Deceive, +5 Int or WP, but 1d10+10 Corruption.

specialAbilities.name: Inherited Corruption
specialAbilities.description: Choose either Intelligence or Willpower - that characteristic receives a permanent +5 bonus. However, you immediately gain 1d10+10 Corruption Points (rolled once at character creation), representing the deep spiritual taint that runs through your family line. You have learned to hide this corruption, but it is always present.
